abstract: If Game 6 of the World Series is rained out, the Cardinals might be able to bring back their ace, Chris Carpenter, on short rest.
snippet: If Game 6 of the World Series is rained out, the Cardinals might be able to bring back their ace, Chris Carpenter, on short rest.
lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS - With a 90 percent chance of rain predicted for Wednesday, there is a possibility that Game 6 of the World Series at Busch Stadium could be rained out. If so, it might provide the St. Louis Cardinals with the opportunity to bring their ace, Chris Carpenter, back on short rest for a potential Game 7 on Friday.

headline.main: In Case of Rain, a Case for Carpenter
